Package org.cid15.aem.veneer.core.servlets.optionsprovider

Class AbstractOptionsProviderServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
        • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingAllMethodsServlet
          • org.cid15.aem.veneer.core.servlets.AbstractJsonResponseServlet
            • org.cid15.aem.veneer.core.servlets.optionsprovider.AbstractOptionsProviderServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    public abstract class AbstractOptionsProviderServlet
extends AbstractJsonResponseServlet
    Base class for providing a list of "options" to a component dialog widget. An option is simply a text/value pair to be rendered in a selection box. The implementing class determines how these options are retrieved from the repository (or external provider, such as a web service).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        protected abstract List<Option> getOptions​(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Get a list of "options" (text/value pairs) for rendering in an authoring dialog. Building the list of options is handled by the implementing class and will vary depending on the requirements for the component dialog calling this servlet.
        Parameters:
        request - Sling request
        Returns:
        list of options as determined by the implementing class

      • getOptionsRoot

        protected abstract Optional<String> getOptionsRoot​(SlingHttpServletRequest request)
        Parameters:
        request - Sling request
        Returns:
        Optional name of root JSON object containing options
